game.name: Trials of Valor
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight, block, and evade through the deadly Trials of Valor. Your timing and reflexes decide survival in this real-time roguelike fighter. Master diverse classes, and experience the character progression of an entire RPG in each run as you perfect your build or die trying.
